org.corfudb.client.entries

Class CorfuDBStreamEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.client.entries.CorfuDBStreamEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<CorfuDBStreamEntry>, IPayload
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CorfuDBStreamMoveEntry, CorfuDBStreamStartEntry

    public class CorfuDBStreamEntry
extends Object
implements IPayload, Serializable, Comparable<CorfuDBStreamEntry>
    This class represents an entry inside a stream.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean isCopy
      Whether or not this entry is a copy
      long originalAddress
      If it is a copy, what the original address was
      byte[] payload
      The payload of the entry, which may be null.
      Timestamp ts
      The timestamp of the entry

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CorfuDBStreamEntry(Map<UUID,Long> epochMap)
      Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with no payload, residing in multiple streams.
      CorfuDBStreamEntry(Map<UUID,Long> epochMap, byte[] payload)
      Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with a byte array payload, residing in multiple streams.
      CorfuDBStreamEntry(Map<UUID,Long> epochMap, Serializable payloadObject)
      Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with a serializable payload, residing in multiple streams.
      CorfuDBStreamEntry(UUID streamID, byte[] payload, long epoch)
      Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with a byte array payload, residing in a single stream.
      CorfuDBStreamEntry(UUID streamID, long epoch)
      Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with no payload, residing in a single stream.
      CorfuDBStreamEntry(UUID streamID, Serializable payloadObject, long epoch)
      Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with a serializable object, residing in a single stream.

      • CorfuDBStreamEntry

        public CorfuDBStreamEntry(UUID streamID,
                          Serializable payloadObject,
                          long epoch)
                   throws IOException
        Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with a serializable object, residing in a single stream.
        Parameters:
        streamID - The ID of the stream the entry is in.
        payloadObject - A serializable object containing the payload to insert.
        epoch - The epoch of the entry.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • CorfuDBStreamEntry

        public CorfuDBStreamEntry(UUID streamID,
                          byte[] payload,
                          long epoch)
                   throws IOException
        Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with a byte array payload, residing in a single stream.
        Parameters:
        streamID - The ID of the stream the entry is in.
        payload - A byte array representing the payload to inert.
        epoch - The epoch of the entry.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • CorfuDBStreamEntry

                          long epoch)
        Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with no payload, residing in a single stream.
        Parameters:
        streamID - The ID of the stream the entry is in.
        epoch - The epoch of the entry.

      • CorfuDBStreamEntry

        public CorfuDBStreamEntry(Map<UUID,Long> epochMap,
                          Serializable payloadObject)
                   throws IOException
        Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with a serializable payload, residing in multiple streams.
        Parameters:
        epochMap - A map containing all the streams and epochs this entry is to be inserted in.
        payloadObject - The serializable object to insert.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • CorfuDBStreamEntry

                          byte[] payload)
        Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with a byte array payload, residing in multiple streams.
        Parameters:
        epochMap - A map containing all the streams and epochs this entry is to be inserted in.
        payload - A byte array representing the payload to insert.

        Create a new CorfuDBStreamEntry with no payload, residing in multiple streams.
        Parameters:
        epochMap - A map containing all the streams and epochs this entry is to be inserted in.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(CorfuDBStreamEntry cse)
        Compare this entry to another object, and return based on order.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable<CorfuDBStreamEntry>
        Parameters:
        cse - The entry to compare against.
        Returns:
        0 if the entries are at the same position (and therefore the same entry), >0 if this entry is ahead of the provided entry, <0 if this entry is behind the provided entry.

      • setTimestamp

        public void setTimestamp(Timestamp ts)

      • containsStream

        public boolean containsStream(UUID stream)
        Returns whether or not the entry is in a given stream.
        Parameters:
        id - The UUID of the stream to check.
        Returns:
        True, if the entry is in the stream, false otherwise.

      • checkEpoch

        public boolean checkEpoch(Map<UUID,Long> epochMap)
        Returns whether or not the entry is in a given epochmap.
        Parameters:
        epochMap - A map describing the epoch to check against.
        Returns:
        True, if the entry is in the epoch, false otherwise.
